game.title: The Prince's Quest
game.synopsis: In this fantasy world, a young prince embarks on a quest to restore peace and justice to his kingdom.
game.beginning: A long time ago, in a kingdom far away, the prince sets out on his journey to defeat the evil forces that threaten his land.
game.ending: After battling fierce monsters and cunning villains, he restores harmony, fulfilling a prophecy foretold long ago.
